nodes.excerpt: An easy to understand overview of the Scrum framework via a set of portable study cards covering everything you need to know about Scrum.
nodes.title: Scrum Study Cards - An easy to understand overview of the Scrum framework.
nodes.author: Alex Desharnais

localize.description: 通过一套便携式学习卡，对Scrum框架进行了简单易懂的概述，涵盖了你需要知道的关于Scrum的一切。
localize.tagline: 简单易懂的Scrum框架概述。

localize.description: 通過一套便攜式學習卡，對Scrum框架進行了簡單易懂的概述，涵蓋了你需要知道的關於Scrum的一切。
localize.tagline: 簡單易懂的Scrum框架概述。

nodes.excerpt: SpoofSense is a powerful AI algorithm that detects Live v/s Spoof Faces in an Image. It uses Deep Learning to detect Print/Digital Spoof Faces and authenticates Real Faces using just a picture.
nodes.title: SpoofSense - AI for Face Liveness Detection
nodes.author: Kartikeya Bhardwaj

localize.description: SpoofSense是一个强大的人工智能算法，可以检测图像中的活人脸与假人脸。它使用深度学习来检测打印/数字欺骗面孔，并仅使用一张图片来验证真实面孔。
localize.tagline: 人脸活络度检测的AI

localize.description: SpoofSense是一個強大的人工智能算法，可以檢測圖像中的活人臉與假人臉。它使用深度學習來檢測打印/數字欺騙面孔，並僅使用一張圖片來驗證真實面孔。
localize.tagline: 人臉活絡度檢測的AI

nodes.excerpt: Pictogram makes it easy to use custom app icons on your Mac. It even preserves your custom icons after your apps update themselves. Requires macOS 11.0 or newer.
nodes.title: Pictogram - Customize macOS app icons with ease
nodes.author: Chenghao Mou

localize.description: Pictogram 让你在 Mac 上轻松使用自定义 app 图标。它甚至可以在你的 app 更新后保留你的自定义图标。需要 macOS 11.0 或更新版本。
localize.tagline: 轻松定制macOS应用图标

localize.description: Pictogram 讓你在 Mac 上輕鬆使用自定義 app 圖標。它甚至可以在你的 app 更新後保留你的自定義圖標。需要 macOS 11.0 或更新版本。
localize.tagline: 輕鬆定製macOS應用圖標

nodes.excerpt: A perfectly rounded icon library made for designers, developers, and pretty much everyone. They are free to use and open source.
nodes.title: Akar Icons - Perfectly rounded icon library for your projects.

localize.description: 一个为设计师、开发者以及几乎所有人打造的完美圆润的图标库。它们是免费使用和开源的。
localize.tagline: 为您的项目提供完美的圆形图标库。

localize.tagline: 爲您的項目提供完美的圓形圖標庫。

nodes.excerpt: In case you haven't (jk, everyone has heard)... --------- Simple site showing which brokerages are allowing/blocking trading for certain apps so you figure out where you want to move your money too
nodes.title: Can I Trade It? - Which brokerages let you trade $GME, $NOK, $BB, $AMC, etc..
nodes.author: Connor Van Ooyen

localize.description: 如果你没有(jk，大家都听说过)... ... --------- 简单的网站，显示哪些经纪公司允许/阻止某些应用程序的交易，这样你就可以弄清楚你想把你的钱也转移到哪里去。
localize.tagline: 哪些券商可以让你交易$GME，$NOK，$BB，$AMC等。

localize.description: 如果你沒有(jk，大家都聽說過)... ... --------- 簡單的網站，顯示哪些經紀公司允許/阻止某些應用程序的交易，這樣你就可以弄清楚你想把你的錢也轉移到哪裏去。
localize.tagline: 哪些券商可以讓你交易$GME，$NOK，$BB，$AMC等。

nodes.excerpt: Add OAuth integrations to your Bubble.io app instantly with no-code plugins built by Pathfix. Pathfix plugins handle the entire OAuth process and gives you instant access to provider Actions, without API or endpoint complexity.
nodes.title: Bubble Integration Plugins by Pathfix - Add OAuth integrations to your Bubble.io app, instantly
nodes.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 通过Pathfix构建的无代码插件，可以立即为你的Bubble.io应用添加OAuth集成。Pathfix插件处理整个OAuth过程，并让你立即访问提供者的行为，没有API或终端的复杂性。
localize.tagline: 将OAuth集成到你的Bubble.io应用中，即刻就能实现。

localize.description: 通過Pathfix構建的無代碼插件，可以立即爲你的Bubble.io應用添加OAuth集成。Pathfix插件處理整個OAuth過程，並讓你立即訪問提供者的行爲，沒有API或終端的複雜性。
localize.tagline: 將OAuth集成到你的Bubble.io應用中，即刻就能實現。

nodes.excerpt: Imitate lets you practice pronunciation with real-life videos from youtube, and lets you listen to your own recordings to have an instant feedback loop.
nodes.title: Imitate - Learn French pronunciation with real-life videos
nodes.author: Lars Karbo

localize.description: Imitate可以让你用youtube上的真人视频来练习发音，并让你听自己的录音，有一个即时的反馈循环。
localize.tagline: 通过真人视频学习法语发音。

localize.description: Imitate可以讓你用youtube上的真人視頻來練習發音，並讓你聽自己的錄音，有一個即時的反饋循環。
localize.tagline: 通過真人視頻學習法語發音。

nodes.excerpt: Learn Stash is a hand-picked personal growth directory featuring the top tools & products categorized by specific goals. We've curated the absolute best self improvement resources to guarantee that your next download or purchase is worth your time & money.
nodes.title: Learn Stash - Discover the best personal growth tools all in one place 💙

localize.tagline: 发现最好的个人成长工具都在一个地方💙。

nodes.excerpt: All in one influencer search, management and campaign tracking software from Buzzbomb. This is this our first functionality launch and we'll be adding Social Scheduling, Social Monitoring and Competitor Tracking in the coming months.
nodes.title: Influencers by Buzzbomb - Find, manage and track influencers.
nodes.author: Isaac Joy

localize.description: Buzzbomb的所有影响者搜索、管理和活动跟踪软件。这是我们首次推出的功能，我们将在未来几个月内增加社交日程安排、社交监控和竞争对手跟踪功能。
localize.tagline: 寻找、管理和跟踪影响者。

localize.description: Buzzbomb的所有影響者搜索、管理和活動跟蹤軟件。這是我們首次推出的功能，我們將在未來幾個月內增加社交日程安排、社交監控和競爭對手跟蹤功能。
localize.tagline: 尋找、管理和跟蹤影響者。

nodes.excerpt: A lot of apps include a system “Share” menu, but the default share services are usually not very useful. Shareful provides some useful share services like Copy, Open In, Save As, and Save to Downloads.
nodes.title: Shareful - Supercharge the macOS share menu
nodes.author: Sindre Sorhus

localize.description: 很多应用都包含了系统的 "共享 "菜单，但默认的共享服务通常都不是很有用。Shareful提供了一些有用的共享服务，比如复制、打开在、另存为和保存到下载。
localize.tagline: 超级充电的macOS共享菜单

localize.description: 很多應用都包含了系統的 "共享 "菜單，但默認的共享服務通常都不是很有用。Shareful提供了一些有用的共享服務，比如複製、打開在、另存爲和保存到下載。
localize.tagline: 超級充電的macOS共享菜單

nodes.excerpt: Paraglide is the first machine learning API that lets you create, customize, and collaborate on automated AI workflows in minutes. Modify what you want, and let us handle the rest.
nodes.title: Paraglide - Create automated AI workflows in minutes.
nodes.author: Robleh Jama

localize.description: Paraglide是第一个机器学习API，让你可以在几分钟内创建、定制和协作自动化AI工作流程。修改你想要的东西，让我们来处理剩下的事情。
localize.tagline: 在几分钟内创建自动化的AI工作流程。

localize.description: Paraglide是第一個機器學習API，讓你可以在幾分鐘內創建、定製和協作自動化AI工作流程。修改你想要的東西，讓我們來處理剩下的事情。
localize.tagline: 在幾分鐘內創建自動化的AI工作流程。

nodes.excerpt: Storetasker matches you to a trusted Shopify Expert within a few hours for projects big and small. We've interviewed over 5,000 developers, hand selected the top 5%, and streamlined the experience from end to end.
nodes.title: Storetasker 2.0 - Where Shopify brands meet their developer
nodes.author: Charlie Fogarty

localize.description: Storetasker 会在几小时内为您匹配到值得信赖的 Shopify 专家，为您提供大大小小的项目。我们已经采访了超过5000名开发人员，亲自挑选了前5%的开发人员，并从头到尾简化了体验。
localize.tagline: Shopify品牌在哪里遇到他们的开发者

localize.description: Storetasker 會在幾小時內爲您匹配到值得信賴的 Shopify 專家，爲您提供大大小小的項目。我們已經採訪了超過5000名開發人員，親自挑選了前5%的開發人員，並從頭到尾簡化了體驗。
localize.tagline: Shopify品牌在哪裏遇到他們的開發者

nodes.excerpt: Sook empowers you to create a fully customised store, book by the hour and get detailed footfall analytics after your event. Simply drag & drop your digital content onto the walls of your virtual store and it comes to life as soon as your booking begins.
nodes.title: Sook Store Builder - Retail space as a service, by the hour, with video-walls!
nodes.author: Sarel van Baalen

localize.description: Sook使您能够创建一个完全定制的商店，按小时预订，并在活动结束后获得详细的人流分析。只需简单地将您的数字内容拖放到虚拟商店的墙壁上，它就会在您的预订开始后立即变成现实。
localize.tagline: 零售空间作为一种服务，按小时计算，有视频墙!

localize.description: Sook使您能夠創建一個完全定製的商店，按小時預訂，並在活動結束後獲得詳細的人流分析。只需簡單地將您的數字內容拖放到虛擬商店的牆壁上，它就會在您的預訂開始後立即變成現實。
localize.tagline: 零售空間作爲一種服務，按小時計算，有視頻牆!

nodes.excerpt: It's been a long 2020, eh? 🥵 Sometimes, thanking someone for going above and beyond their ways to help you is not enough. Send them a "kudos" in a public Slack channel to share their awesomeness with everyone and spread a bit of positivity. 🚀
nodes.title: Kudosbot - Your friendly neighbourhood kudos spreader.
nodes.author: Nikhil Gurnani

localize.description: 这是一个漫长的2020年，嗯？🥵 有时候，感谢一个人对你的帮助是远远不够的。在公共Slack频道里给他们发个 "赞"，和大家一起分享他们的精彩，传播一点正能量。🚀
localize.tagline: 你的友好邻居的赞誉传播者。

localize.description: 這是一個漫長的2020年，嗯？🥵 有時候，感謝一個人對你的幫助是遠遠不夠的。在公共Slack頻道里給他們發個 "贊"，和大家一起分享他們的精彩，傳播一點正能量。🚀
localize.tagline: 你的友好鄰居的讚譽傳播者。

nodes.excerpt: 🍃 A lightweight solution Simple and focused, its goal is to provide a lightweight solution that can be easily implemented in any development context.
nodes.title: Luxa CSS - A minimalist CSS framework.

localize.description: 它的目标是提供一个可以在任何开发环境中轻松实现的轻量级解决方案。
localize.tagline: 一个简约的CSS框架。

localize.description: 它的目標是提供一個可以在任何開發環境中輕鬆實現的輕量級解決方案。
localize.tagline: 一個簡約的CSS框架。

nodes.excerpt: Just a curated list of the best games to play on your next video call Built during another lockdown in the UK, hopefully these games get you through your next awkward work social as they have for us... By https://shoreditchdesignstudio.com/, illustrations by https://craftwork.design/

nodes.excerpt: ZelaaPayAE crypto cards allow for transactions online and in brick-and-mortar establishments at market rates, backed by our cryptocurrency ZPAE. With the ZPAYae card, you can immediately exchange fiat to crypto and then pay directly for your goods or send it to a friend.
nodes.title: ZPAE Crypto Card - Pay with ZPAE Card around the world at 40,000,000+ merchants
nodes.author: Vishal Sharma

localize.description: ZelaaPayAE加密卡可以按市场价格在网上和实体店进行交易，由我们的加密货币ZPAE支持。使用ZPAYae卡，您可以立即将货币兑换成加密货币，然后直接支付货款或发送给朋友。
localize.tagline: 在全球40,000,000+商户使用ZPAE卡支付。

localize.description: ZelaaPayAE加密卡可以按市場價格在網上和實體店進行交易，由我們的加密貨幣ZPAE支持。使用ZPAYae卡，您可以立即將貨幣兌換成加密貨幣，然後直接支付貨款或發送給朋友。
localize.tagline: 在全球40,000,000+商戶使用ZPAE卡支付。

nodes.excerpt: Use https://pudding.ai/ for real-time ad creative analysis to maximize your campaign ROI and work efficiency. Get actionable, data-driven AI insights 💡 for all your ad creatives and bridge the gap by ensuring great communication between your creative & media teams.
nodes.title: Pudding.ai - Real-time feedback for your ad creatives
nodes.author: Dina Taitelbaum

localize.description: 使用https://pudding.ai/，进行实时广告创意分析，以最大限度地提高您的广告活动投资回报率和工作效率。为您的所有广告创意获取可操作的、数据驱动的AI洞察力💡，并通过确保您的创意和媒体团队之间的巨大沟通来弥补差距。

nodes.excerpt: Pickle helps companies understand every phone and video conversation they have with their customers. We do this by automatically transcribing calls and extracting key insights, questions, and trends.
nodes.title: Pickle - Transcribe and analyze phone and video conversations
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: Pickle帮助企业了解他们与客户的每一次电话和视频对话。我们通过自动转录电话并提取关键见解、问题和趋势来实现这一目标。
localize.tagline: 抄录和分析电话和视频对话。

localize.description: Pickle幫助企業瞭解他們與客戶的每一次電話和視頻對話。我們通過自動轉錄電話並提取關鍵見解、問題和趨勢來實現這一目標。
localize.tagline: 抄錄和分析電話和視頻對話。

nodes.excerpt: Threadletter allows converting a Revue newsletter to a Twitter thread in seconds. Enter the Revue API key, select the issue, and publish the thread via Chirr App or copy-paste to Twitter.
nodes.title: Threadletter - Convert Revue newsletter to Twitter thread in seconds
nodes.author: Sasha Koss

localize.description: Threadletter允许在几秒钟内将Revue通讯转换为Twitter主题。输入Revue的API密钥，选择问题，并通过Chirr App或复制粘贴到Twitter发布线程。
localize.tagline: 在几秒钟内将Revue通讯转换为Twitter线程

localize.description: Threadletter允許在幾秒鐘內將Revue通訊轉換爲Twitter主題。輸入Revue的API密鑰，選擇問題，並通過Chirr App或複製粘貼到Twitter發佈線程。
localize.tagline: 在幾秒鐘內將Revue通訊轉換爲Twitter線程
